channel.title: placeholder images on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in placeholder images on Konigi

item.title: flickholdr.com: Placeholder images from flickr
item.description: Best part of flickholdr, a placeholder image service that grabs images from flickr, is how you can string together an odd set of tags to get unusual placeholders. http://flickholdr.com/

item.title: lorempixum: Placeholder images for every case
item.description: lorempixum is a cool placeholder image service for html wireframers and prototypers. Set dimensions for a placeholder image, and optionally select a category and color or black and white, and the URL will provided will serve a random image for your html page. Via @poornerd http://lorempixum.com/

item.title: Placehold.it: Simple image placeholders
item.description: Placehold.it is a placeholder image service that let's you place images using a url like this: http://placehold.it/350x150 which ends up like the box below when placed in an image tag. Via @moddpodd http://placehold.it

item.title: {placekitten}
item.description: {placekitten}. Kittens for placeholder images, inspired by placeholder.it. Use at your own risk. See also: http://placedog.com/ and http://placesheen.com/ Via @nickf http://placekitten.com/
